text:
Any chance we can get our links back!!
Just had a shout up in the office and everyone misses it.

Just my use case, i’m editing a page and want to jump to the design manager (not opened yet). I used to just cmd+click the design manager and it Loaded in New Tab. Now I need to make sure my page is saved -> exit, open the design manager link in my new tab go back to my other tab and then hit back to go back to the editor…
